original_title: Ο Μπαμπάς Μου, ο Λένιν και ο Φρέντυ
overview: During the 80's, in Athens, a nine-year old girl gradually loses touch with her workaholic communist father. She fantasizes that Vladimir Lenin wants to harm him. Things get worse when the American movie maniac Freddy Krueger joins forces with the Russian.
title: Dad, Lenin and Freddy
